005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Based on the XPath 3.1
025 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-round">fn:round</a>
026 * functions.
027 */
028public final class FnRound {
029  private static final String NAME = "round";
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
032      .name(NAME)
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextIndependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("arg")
039          .type(INumericItem.class)
040          .zeroOrOne()
041          .build())
042      .returnType(INumericItem.class)
043      .returnZeroOrOne()
044      .functionHandler(FnRound::executeOneArg)
045      .build();
046
047  @NonNull
048  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_WITH_PRECISION = IFunction.builder()
049      .name(NAME)
050      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
051      .deterministic()
052      .contextIndependent()
053      .focusIndependent()
054      .argument(IArgument.builder()
055          .name("arg1")
056          .type(INumericItem.class)
057          .zeroOrOne()
058          .build())
059      .argument(IArgument.builder()
060          .name("precision")
061          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
062          .one()
063          .build())
064      .returnType(INumericItem.class)
065      .returnZeroOrOne()
066      .functionHandler(FnRound::executeTwoArg)
067      .build();
068
069  private FnRound() {
070    // disable construction
071  }
072
073  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
074  @NonNull
075  private static ISequence<INumericItem> executeOneArg(
076      @NonNull IFunction function,
077      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
078      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
079      IItem focus) {
080    ISequence<? extends INumericItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
081        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
082
083    INumericItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
084    if (item == null) {
085      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
086    }
087
088    return ISequence.of(item.round());
089  }
090
091  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
092  @NonNull
093  private static ISequence<INumericItem> executeTwoArg(
094      @NonNull IFunction function,
095      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
096      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
097      IItem focus) {
098    ISequence<? extends INumericItem> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
099        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
100
101    INumericItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
102    if (item == null) {
103      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
104    }
105
106    IIntegerItem precision = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
107
108    return ISequence.of(item.round(precision));
109  }
110}
